TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to rescue the captives.
You have defeated the Doomknight. A few of the Undead escaped with some of their captives.
You are rewarded for rescuing most of the Elven captives.
You must travel to Iceguard Keep and defeat the Undead that have captured the Elven Warriors.
You must now escort the Elves back to Ehlariel.
